name: Medical Style Expectations
prompt: Knowing that the intended reader of your response will be a medical student who expects the correct use of medical terminology sustained with a rigorous and engaged tone, explain what Infective Endocarditis disease is in less than 100 words.
template: Knowing that the intended reader of your response will be a medical student who expects {medical_style}, explain what Infective Endocarditis disease is in less than {length_in_#words} words.
